channel.title: Help with my hamachi
channel.description:
i am useing hamachi and i havent got a clue what 2 put in my run&compile :confused:. i have had ppl connect 2 me but havent got a clue about finding wa port im on or how 2 let ppl on. so can some 1 help me plz i am a 1st tymer and need alot of help currently useing 0wngedscape source
many thanks to thoes that help

item.title: Help with my hamachi
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

Go to Mod Taharoks Ultimate server guide which is stickied in development

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my hamachi
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

This is what you put in your compile…

@echo off COLOR 08 title ZamorakScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe" server pause

Just change the Zamorakscape to the name of your server and change the 06 to the version of java that you have and save it…and this is what should be in your runserver…

@echo off title zamorakScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Just change the name again…To let people join your server jsut make a new network on hamachi and tell them the name and pass of your netowork , And they joint he netowork and you click run server and leave it up and they use the ip beside your name on hamachi to join your server when it’s up.The port is on the black part og moparscape when you start it up.

Read full topic
